content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler(position (-6.0, 24.5)), and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)

### Iron plate factory at positions (40.0, -82.0), (45.0, -83.0), (42.0, -81.0), (45.0, -80.0), (40.0, -79.0)
Consists of 
- Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0)) 
- Furnace (position (45.0, -83.0)) 
- Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0)) 
- Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0)) 
- Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0)) 
- Chests at positions (43.5, -82.5), (40.5, -80.5), (43.5, -81.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### Inserter system at positions (3.5, 0.5) and (0.5, 3.5)
Consists of 
- Burner inserter (position (3.5, 0.5)) 
- Burner inserter (position (0.5, 3.5)) 
- Chests at positions (2.5, 0.5) and (0.5, 2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment but being out of fuel
- Ensure you have enough fuel in your burner equipment before using it
- Make sure to refuel your burner equipment when it runs out of fuel

### Errors when using furnaces but having no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure you have enough ingredients to smelt in your furnace before using it
- Make sure to provide ingredients to your furnace when it runs out of them

### Errors when using steam engines but having no input liquid
- Ensure you have a fluid input connection to your steam engine before using it
- Make sure to provide a fluid input to your steam engine when it is not connected

### Errors when using boilers but being out of fuel
- Ensure you have enough fuel in your boiler before using it
- Make sure to refuel your boiler when it runs out of fuel

### Errors when using offshore pumps but having no fluid output
- Ensure you have a fluid output connection from your offshore pump before using it
- Make sure to provide a fluid output from your offshore pump when it is not connected
